duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide on-site support operations and in-person support for request fulfillment, incident management, and access management related process workflows.
Install, diagnose, repair, maintain, and upgrade all computer hardware and equipment to ensure optimal workstation performance.
Serve as tier II escalation support from the service desk and assist with smart hands support and light troubleshooting of basic network and server hardware.
Troubleshoot problem areas in a timely and accurate fashion, and provide end-user assistance where required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in the field of computer science or information technology is preferred. A+ Certification or similar certification required OR willing to obtain within 1 year of hire date. ITILv3 Foundations is preferred. An additional industry certification in desktop, mobile, network, or server technology is required. Experience working in the healthcare industry or mission-critical industry and regulated environment (HIPAA) is preferred.
